page.shortlink: api client api a5 u json expand method

argument.name: object
argument.description: The object or array to expand.

argument.name: map
argument.description: The property map object filled in by *[link:A5.u.json.compress]*.

page.returns: expandedObject (object) - The expanded version of the passed in object.
page.description: Expand a previously compressed object using a compressed object and map. See *[link:A5.u.json.compress]*.
